Name: Landmarks, Beekman Hotel, Manhattan (N 240396 HIM).
Title: Application number N 240396 HIM Temple Court (now the Beekman Hotel) Atrium submitted by the Landmarks Preservation Commission, pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter and Section 25-303 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, for the designation of the Temple Court Building (now the Beekman Hotel) Atrium, located at 5 Beekman Street (Block 90, Lot 7503), as an historic landmark (DL-540/LP-2681), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 1, Council District 1.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
